alert.note: Alert for Western Nevada Basin and Range including Pyramid Lake (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Lake Wind Advisory issued October 25 at 7:58PM PDT until October 25 at 9:00PM PDT by NWS Reno
info.description: ...LAKE WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM PDT THIS EVENING FOR PYRAMID LAKE... * CHANGES....Advisory level wind gusts to 30-35 mph continue across Pyramid Lake. Therefore, Lake Wind Advisory will be extended an hour. * WHAT...West winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 35 mph expected. Waves 1 to 3 feet. * WHERE...Pyramid Lake. * WHEN...Until 9 PM PDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Small boats, kayaks and paddle boards will be prone to capsizing and should remain off lake waters until conditions improve.
info.instruction: Check lake conditions before heading out and be prepared for a sudden increase in winds and wave heights. Consider postponing boating activities on the lake until a day with less wind.

area.areaDesc: Western Nevada Basin and Range including Pyramid Lake
